00012 #include "StateMachineGlobals.h"

00017 using std::pair;
00018 using std::tr1::unordered_map;
00019 using std::tr1::unordered_set;
00020 using std::tr1::shared_ptr;
00021 using std::tr1::enable_shared_from_this;
00022 using std::tr1::hash;
00023 
00024 namespace TenUI{
00025         
00026         class Transition;
00027         
00028         class StateMachine : public EventDispatcher, public enable_shared_from_this<StateMachine> {
00029         public:
00030                 enum StateMachineException { STATE_ID_DOESNT_EXIST, TRANSITION_DOESNT_EXIST, STATE_ID_REGISTERED_ALREADY, TRANSITION_REGISTER_ALREADY, TRANSITION_ALREADY_SPECIFIED_BY_GENERALIZATION }; 
00031                         
00032         public:
00033                 StateMachine();
00034                 virtual ~StateMachine();
00035         
00036                 shared_ptr<State>               getCurState();
00037                 shared_ptr<Transition>  getCurTransition();
00038                 
00039                 bool                                    registerState(const shared_ptr<State>& newState, bool isStartState=false);
00040                 bool                                    registerTransition(const shared_ptr<Transition>& );
00041         
00042                 shared_ptr<State>               getStartState();
00043                 shared_ptr<State>               getState(const StateIDType& );
00044                 shared_ptr< unordered_set<StateIDType> > getStateIDs();
00045                 shared_ptr<Transition>  getTransition(const StateIDType& , const StateIDType& );
00046                 
00047                 bool                                    requestStateChange(const StateIDType& nextState);
00048                 
00049                 void                                    updateStateMachine();
00050                 
00051         private: 
00052                 typedef unordered_map< StateIDType, shared_ptr<State>, hash<StateIDType> > StateMapType;
00053                 typedef unordered_map< pair<StateIDType, StateIDType>, shared_ptr<Transition>, hash_pair<StateIDType> > TransitionMapType;
00054                 typedef unordered_map< StateIDType, shared_ptr<Transition>, hash<StateIDType> > AnyStateTransitionMapType;
00055                 
00056                 StateMapType                            states;
00057         
00058                 // specific transitions
00059                 TransitionMapType                       transitions;
00060                 // generalized transitions (from or to any states)
00061                 AnyStateTransitionMapType       fromAnyStateStates;
00062                 AnyStateTransitionMapType       toAnyStateStates;
00063                 // super generalization (from and to anystate);
00064                 shared_ptr<Transition>          anyStateChangeTransition;
00065                 
00066                 shared_ptr<State>                       startState;
00067                 shared_ptr<State>                       curState;
00068                 shared_ptr<Transition>          curTransition;
00069                 
00070         private:
00071                 void changeState(const shared_ptr<State>& newState, const shared_ptr<Transition>& transition);
00072         };
00073 }
